tier.item: I(N) NEG- 1S suspect- CAUS him/her- P
Several authors (Heinämäki 1984, Vainikka 1989) associate this phenomenon with the aspectual role of
the partitive to signal that the event is [-BOUNDED] or [-COMPLETED].
